attributes.title: Iâ€™m still recovering
attributes.review: I want to make this perfectly clear right out of the gate: I really donâ€™t like rashes like anyone else but this is ridiculous. When I downloaded the app the first red flag was my phone got softer. I donâ€™t know how to describe it, but within a few minutes after downloading my phone was noticeably softer, and sort of slimy. It left a residue on my hands, it was quite filmy. I didnâ€™t think much of it at first, but after a while I was able to bend my phone and ring out the juice. That wasnâ€™t the worst part, after about an hour my phone was getting very hot and started to burn my hand. But thatâ€™s not even close to what happened inside of the app. To sort of outline the user experience, when you first open the app youâ€™re greeted with a video or a horse giving birth. Itâ€™s quite graphic and uses a lot of close ups. There is a narration of Trump sort of describing whatâ€™s happening, and giving his opinions. (Spoiler: he really, really likes the video.) Trump goes on to tell an anecdote about him riding a horse and becoming so enthralled with the experience that he actually legally married that horse. But to get back to the user experience, the thing that I thought was odd was the fact that it asked me to send photographs of my feet for â€œpresidential records.â€ Of course I obliged, but then the app asked for more â€œexciting photographs.â€ I drew the line there and didnâ€™t go through with it because I was already wildly uncomfortable with sending pictures of my feet in the first place. After a few weeks of using the app on a daily basis, the issues with my phone didnâ€™t go away. It was still slimy and squishy, but I started to develop this rash on my hands from it. The rash at first was typical inflammation and a little itching but after about a week I started getting these large blisters filled with pus on my hands. Every 6 hours or so one would pop, so I had to make sure that I had tissues near me at all times. I went to the doctor and they are confused by it, and they said they have never seen anything like it. I used to be a trump supporter, but after this experience I will not vote for someone who gives me rashes on my skin. Looks like I will have to vote for a stupid liberal. Trump, you took the L big here.

please donâ€™t take tiktok. itâ€™s like another home there and someone og is need it to escape our own lives and make new friends. but if you do, karma will get you trump â¤ï¸like literally. so please, i beg you not to ban it.
